actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 410 (a) of title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of dependency and indemnity compensation to certain survivors of deceased veterans who were rated 100 percent disabled by reason of service- connected disabilities for 20 or more years.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of dependency and indemnity compensation to the widow, children, or parents of deceased veterans who were rated 100 percent disabled by reason of service-connected disabilities for twenty or more years. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 410 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 410 (a) of title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of dependency and indemnity compensation to certain survivors of deceased veterans who were rated 100 percent disabled by reason of service- connected disabilities for 20 or more years.
